That Allies name is pretty easy to confuse with The Alliance. Can you please 
change it or something, Thecode?

::Zardus/Prowl::

Zardus lets out a breath, watching the predacons fly off. He turns to 
Scattershot.

"Join? What garauntee do I have of your loyalty?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl looks into Iron Raptor's eyes. He wanted to kiss her again, and was 
about to when sounds of gunfire erupted from the Ark's direction. He growls 
softly. Could't they just relax at their own base for once.

He looks down at Iron Raptor, pulling her even closer to him.

"Do you want to let them take care of it? We could fly off somewhere 
quieter..." He says, looking into her eyes again.
